## Loading Text

Utilities for getting raw text into the workflow.

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [load_sample_text](load_sample_text.qmd#moodswing.data.load_sample_text) | Return a single ``(doc_id, text)`` pair from the bundled sample corpus. |
| [list_sample_texts](list_sample_texts.qmd#moodswing.data.list_sample_texts) | Return a list of available document IDs from the bundled sample corpus. |
| [load_text_file](load_text_file.qmd#moodswing.data.load_text_file) | Read a single ``.txt`` file and return a cleaned ``{doc_id, text}`` record. |

## Sentiment Analyzers

Dictionary and spaCy-based sentiment scoring interfaces.

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [DictionarySentimentAnalyzer](DictionarySentimentAnalyzer.qmd#moodswing.sentiment.DictionarySentimentAnalyzer) | Sentence-level sentiment scoring built on dictionary lookups. |
| [SpaCySentimentAnalyzer](SpaCySentimentAnalyzer.qmd#moodswing.sentiment.SpaCySentimentAnalyzer) | Derive per-sentence sentiment values from a spaCy pipeline. |
| [DictionarySentimentAnalyzer.sentence_scores](DictionarySentimentAnalyzer.sentence_scores.qmd#moodswing.sentiment.DictionarySentimentAnalyzer.sentence_scores) | Return one sentiment score per sentence. |
| [SpaCySentimentAnalyzer.text_scores](SpaCySentimentAnalyzer.text_scores.qmd#moodswing.sentiment.SpaCySentimentAnalyzer.text_scores) | Split raw text into sentences and score each one. |
